verbose_text: Pursuing the mechanism for the decrease in RhoA activity, a pathway was identified by which integrin engagement activated the tyrosine kinase Src that phosphorylated and activated the RhoA GAP p190RhoGAP thereby lowering RhoA activity [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Src that phosphorylated and activated the RhoA GAP p190RhoGAP thereby lowering RhoA
